selected_quotes: 9/10 authors believe peer review improved the last paper they published. Our survey on attitudes towards #peerreview
Researchers in the arts humanities, social sciences, and economics are least satisfied with the peer-review system
The Northern American and European researchers have lowest satisfaction with peer review than others according
Interesting 2012 survey of attitudes to peer review: indicating double-blind considered to be most effective.

wikipedia.title: Review Quality Collector
wikipedia.summary: Review Quality Collector (RQC) is a software service that aims to improve the quality of scholarly peer review by providing reviewers with a showable receipt for their work that certifies the quantity and quality of the reviewing they provided.
